com.fasterxml.clustermate.client

Class NodeFailure

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.NodeFailure

  • public class NodeFailure
extends Object
    Class that contains information about failure of an operation as it relates to call(s) to a single server node. Each instance contains at least one actual CallFailure.
